cause.description:
Paula Schomerus was a guest student at Burke High school during the 2006-2007 school year. She was a great part of the Burke community, and was lots of fun, but on June 25, 2007, she went back to Germany. This cause was organized to <u> Bring Paula Back!</u>
1. Paula is great, and Germany shouldn't hog her.
2. Paula has an awesome accent.
3. If need be, Amanda and Ben will fly a helicopter to Germany to get Paula.
cause.mission: Bring Paula Schomerus back to the United States.
cause.name: Bring Paula Back!
